version_description:
Daily 7s: experience a whole new world of fantasy football!
Pick the 7 players you think will score most fantasy points each day at UEFA EURO 2016.
Player list now displays updated squads after official confirmations by national teams.
Challenge your friends to create their own daily teams and compete with them head-to-head.
View points scored by your team.
User experience enhanced, bugs fixed.

Daily 7s - Celebrity challenges. Go head-to-head with celebrities and see if you can better their scores for the day.
Select the players you think will perform best in their matches that day using the Player Barometer ranking.
User experience enhanced, bugs fixed.

Daily 7s - Celebrity challenges. Go head-to-head with celebrities and see if you can better their scores for the day.
Select the players you think will perform best in their matches that day using the Player Barometer ranking.
User experience enhanced, bugs fixed.

Daily 7s - Celebrity challenges. Go head-to-head with celebrities and see if you can better their scores for the day.
Select the players you think will perform best in their matches that day using the Player Barometer ranking.
User experience enhanced, bugs fixed.
Minor bug fixes and optimization.
Minor bug fixes and optimization.

The official UEFA Champions League Fantasy Football
game is back for the 2016/17 campaign. Grab your share of the action as the best teams in Europe battle to reach the final in Cardiff. Select your team, make transfers, choose your starting line-up and play to win all the points you can. The game’s brilliant interface will enhance your enjoyment of this season’s competition, regularly-updated player transfers and real-time league updates helping users to track every aspect of the competition. The UEFA Champions League Fantasy Football app includes every feature of the game, and gives you the option of receiving notifications, so you can ensure your team is in tip-top condition. Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi, Manuel Neuer, Antoine Griezmann? We've got them all!
Pick your squad from the hundreds of players available and create the best combination for each week's fixtures to earn points and win great prizes.
Create and join private leagues to compete with your family, friends and
workmates. Pit your skills against UEFA Champions League experts and celebrities by including them in your private leagues.

- Added notifications.
- Optimization and minor bug fixes which include:
Performance improvements, user interface enhancements and real time points update.

- Optimization and minor bug fixes which include:
Performance improvements, user interface enhancements and real time points update.

Stay up to date with the latest happenings taking place in this season's UEFA Champions League and gain useful insights provided by our Fantasy Experts.

Is Neuer the toughest goalkeeper to get past this season? Or who's leading the chart for best scorer? The new Player Stats section gives you all the statistics you need to track the performances of your fantasy team, or spot great value buys in the next transfer window!

Forgot to sign up for the group stage? Not to worry! Register now to take on other new gamers in The Knockouts.

Users creating new teams now will take part to the exclusive Knockouts League.

- You can chat with members within your private league or even create smaller groups to interact with each other. Chat groups allow users to get updates with regards to transfers, substitutions or captain changes made by other members of the group.
- Optimisation and fixes with regards to the end of the season

- Enhanced onboarding process which makes it easier for a user to create their team and understand the game!
- Onboarding on a Wednesday: A user can now create their team while the Matchday is live and score points for the remaining fixtures of that matchday!
- You can now re-launch and re-join leagues that you were a part of last season without a sweat!
- Played the game last year? You can now retain your team name from last year if you log in from the same account you used last year!

- Enhanced onboarding process which makes it easier for a user to create their team and understand the game!
- Onboarding on a Wednesday: A user can now create their team while the Matchday is live and score points for the remaining fixtures of that matchday!
- You can now re-launch and re-join leagues that you were a part of last season without a sweat!
- Played the game last year? You can now retain your team name from last year if you log in from the same account you used last year!

This update brings all the final squads for UCL group stage, so you can now get your team ready for Matchday 1!

The update also brings update to key features of the game like transfers, substitutions and your points. We have also resolved some bugs and brought some performance improvements.

The deadline for submitting teams is September 12, 2017 at 20.45 CET. Don’t wait for the last moment and pick your team now! Create a league and invite your friends, family and colleagues to play with you.

If you find any issues or have any suggestions to improve the game, please write to us at: fantasy@support.uefa.com.

- We have optimised the load time of the Home and My Team pages to enhance your experience
- The Leagues section has also been improved to offer a more fluid experience.
Make changes to your team for MD2 now! Remember the deadline is 26 Sep, 20:45CET

This update includes UI enhancements for the iPhone X and iPhone SE. We have also fixed the live points refresh on the home screen card. Enjoy your UCL fantasy gaming experience and don't forget to update your team before the next deadline!

This update includes the following improvements:
- The fixtures widget on the home screen has been enhanced to show the latest match status
- Usability enhancements for Player cards
- Other minor fixes and optimizations across the app

For any issues or suggestions please write to us at: fantasy@support.uefa.com

This update includes UI enhancements for iPhone X and some minor bug fixes.
You can now enjoy a revised €105m budget and unlimited transfers for the UCL knockout stages.
Make sure your team is updated before the Matchday 7 deadline!

For any issues or suggestions please write to us at: fantasy@support.uefa.com

This update includes UI enhancements for the iPhone X and iPhone SE. We have also fixed the live points refresh on the home screen card. Enjoy your UCL fantasy gaming experience and don't forget to update your team before the next deadline!

Make sure your Fantasy team is all set for the final showdown in Kiev as another fascinating UEFA Champions League season is comes to a close.

This update provides information regarding our plans for next season and also a few performance enhancements for the current game.

Continue enjoying your UCL 2017/18 Fantasy gaming experience and stay tuned for next season!
Another fascinating UEFA Champions League season has come to a close but we are busy working on exciting new developments to offer you an amazing gaming experience next season.

The 2018-19 UCL Fantasy game is now accessible via the brand new UCL Gaming Hub app. Update now to enjoy the exciting fantasy gaming experience.
This update includes the following:
- Refreshed look and feel showing off the new UEFA Champions league brand
- All the fantasy game features you need to start picking your team and inviting friends.
- A whole new gamification system where you can earn experience points (XPs), unlock achievements and progress through levels.
- An option to subscribe to notifications that ensure your fantasy team is in top condition before matchday deadlines.

Gaming Hub is the home of Fantasy football, Predictor and additional new games. This update brings you:

Predictor
The popular Predictor game for 2018-19 season is now active and you can now enter your predictions for the Group Stage matches

Daily Fantasy
What if you had no limitation of budget, player position, or players per team? Sounds fantastic? For the first time ever in UEFA Champions League, now you can do just that! Pick a team consisting of any players playing on a day of matches, with no limitation of budget or on position or team

Live Manager
Don’t have time to manage your Fantasy football team throughout the season? Couldn’t enter your Daily team before the deadline? No problem. The new Live Manager game is just the right format for you. Be the manager in the dugout and pick any 3 players for a match and make three substitutions to maxmiise your points!

This update also includes some improvements and fixes to the UCL Fantasy Football game.
Remember, the deadline for submitting your Fantasy Football team is earlier than usual at Sep 18, 2018 at 18.55 CET - Pick your team now! You can also create leagues and invite your friends, family and colleagues to play with you.

For any issues or suggestions please contact us via: https://helpcenter.uefa.com/

This is an important update that brings the following:

Fantasy Football:
- We have fixed a critical bug that affected some users whose teams were not getting saved. Thank you for your feedback!
- This update also activates many features that will be relevant during live matchdays. This is also applicable to the Daily Fantasy and Live Manager games.

Goal of the week:
The popular Goal of the week poll is now part of the Gaming Hub! Watch and vote for the best goals from each matchday.

Player of the week:
We have also added the Player of the week to Gaming Hub. Vote for the best player from each matchday.

Remember, the deadline for submitting your Fantasy Football team is earlier than usual at Sep 18, 2018 at 18.55 CET - Pick your team now! You can also create leagues and invite your friends, family and colleagues to play with you.

For any issues or suggestions please contact us via: https://helpcenter.uefa.com/

Enjoy your fantasy gaming experience and stay tuned for a lot more with the UCL Gaming Hub app!

This update includes the following:

- Fixed a critical bug where some gamers were getting logged out and unable to access their Fantasy team.
- Introduced an alert to inform gamers when new updates are available in the App store
- Fixed some issues and optimised the Manage team section in Fantasy Football
- Predictor users can now see their rank in the Global leaderboards (edited)

For any issues or suggestions please contact us via: https://helpcenter.uefa.com/

Enjoy your fantasy gaming experience and stay tuned for a lot more with the UCL Gaming Hub app!

- Predictor users can now see their rank in the Global leaderboards (edited)

For any issues or suggestions please contact us via: https://helpcenter.uefa.com/

This important update includes fixes to bugs that caused the App to crash for some users. We have also fixed push notification delivery issues as well as login issues reported by some users.

Predictor game:
Now you can see how you rank in the Global leaderboards. You can also challenge your friends using the Challenges feature.

Fantasy games:
All three Fantasy formats now have an enhanced Player card.

This important update includes fixes to bugs that caused the App to crash for some users. We have also fixed push notification delivery issues as well as login issues reported by some users.

Predictor game:
Now you can see how you rank in the Global leaderboards. You can also challenge your friends using the Challenges feature.
This important update includes fixes to bugs that caused the App to crash for some users.

We update our app regularly to make your gaming experience even better. Every update includes bug fixes and performance enhancements.For any issues or suggestions regarding the app, please contact us via: https://helpcenter.uefa.com/

Enjoy your fantasy gaming experience and stay tuned for a lot more with the UCL Gaming Hub app!

Our latest app update includes the following enhancements:

Live Manager:
- Added an Overall points leaderboard
- Implemented an auto-scroll to the latest date on the 'My Picks' screen.

Daily Fantasy:
- Introduced a feature where you can view other users' team from the leaderboards

Apart from that, we've also made a bunch of performance improvements and bug fixes across all the games for a better experience.

We update our app regularly to make your gaming experience even better. Every update includes bugg fixes and performance enhancements.

This version of the app also includes the following:

- Enhancements to the push notifications delivery and subscription
- Bug fixes while making Fantasy football transfers
- Fixed an issue where predictions where not displayed for previous matchdays.
- Introduced indicator for players that are currently playing in Live Manager

Enjoy your fantasy gaming experience and stay tuned for a lot more with the UCL Gaming Hub app!

In this version we've fixed some bugs and introduced a 'Team of the year' card that will be available from Matchday 6.

Enjoy your fantasy gaming experience and stay tuned for a lot more with the UCL Gaming Hub app!

We're kicking off 2019 with an important update to the UCL Gaming Hub app that includes the following improvements:

1. Gaming Hub:
- Updates to the login and registration screens for a simplified experience while trying to access your Fantasy teams.

2. Fantasy Football:
- Access to live events on the matches page
- Optimized loading for the fantasy homepage and league sections
- Fixed a bug in the transfers flow that now allows you to navigate back from the summary without losing your changes.

3. Daily fantasy & Live Manager:
- Gameplay performance improvements and minor bug fixes

For any issues or suggestions please contact us via: https://helpcenter.uefa.com/

Enjoy your fantasy gaming experience and stay tuned for a lot more with the UCL Gaming Hub app!

In this release, we've fixed some bugs to make your gaming experience even better, ahead of the Round of 16 matches.

There have been specific improvements to the login/registration screens along with performance upgrades across the Daily Fantasy and Live Manager games.

For any issues or suggestions regarding the app, please contact us via: https://helpcenter.uefa.com/

- Home/Away information for upcoming matches is now available in the player list while making transfers
- Starting XI and bench indicators (based on match line-ups) are available an hour before kick-off

The official 2019/20 UEFA Champions League Fantasy Football game is now live in the Gaming Hub app!

Become a player and put your football knowledge to the test against friends and football fans worldwide. Ready to bring each Champions League match to life?

Create your Fantasy Football team:

- Assemble your team with Europe’s finest players at your disposal
- Put together a 15-player squad with a €100m transfer budget
- Choose your starting 11 and pick your captain
- Compete against your friends in private leagues

Enjoy your Fantasy Football experience and stay tuned for a lot more to come with the UCL Gaming Hub app!

We’ve improved your gaming experience for matchday 2. This release includes:

- Performance improvements on Fantasy when transferring players
- Updates to the login and sign-up screens
- Optimisation for iOS 13
- Improvements to leagues across all games
- Fixes for a few minor bugs.

We update our app regularly to provide you with the best experience. We’d love to hear about any suggestions or comments you have – just contact us at https://helpcenter.uefa.com/. Good luck for matchday 2!

Take your UEFA gaming experience to the next level with the latest version! Including:
· The official UEFA Champions League Quiz game: prove your football knowledge and go head-to-head with fellow fans in our brand new real-time quiz!
· Bug fixes: as ever, we've fixed some bugs and boosted the overall performance of the app.
That's all for this update – now get competing!

UEFA Champions League Fantasy Football is back! Update your app to make sure you're ready for the final run-in:
- New format adapted to the Finals 2020 Portugal
- Make substitutions as normal for the remaining round of 16 matches
- Get unlimited free transfers after the round of 16 and before the quarter-finals kick off
- Compete in the brand new Fantasy Finals league
- New to the Gaming Hub? You can also create your UEFA.com account by signing in with Apple
Good luck in the final stages, and keep an eye out for more improvements coming soon!

We update our app regularly to make your gaming experience even better. Every update includes bug fixes and performance enhancements.For any issues or suggestions regarding the app, please contact us via: https://helpcenter.uefa.com/

The UEFA Champions League is finally back! Update your app ready for kick-off:
- FANTASY: Compete in the new Fantasy Finals league, starting for the quarter-finals
- PREDICTOR: Compete in the new Predictor Finals league
- FINALS BRACKET: The ultimate bracket challenge – guess the outcome of the final stages
- Have a go at Live Manager, Fantasy 5 and Quiz
Good luck in the final stages!

New season, new features

The official fantasy football game for the UEFA Champions League is back. New features give you more control over your squad.

What’s new for 2020/21:
+ BRAND-NEW LOOK AND DESIGN
+ IMPROVED IN-GAME TEAM MANAGEMENT. Manage your team while matches are being played, and easily set up your team for the next day’s play.
+ NEW FILTERS. Get instant access to your players’ points, price and upcoming matches to make team decisions with more confidence.

Good luck to everyone playing UEFA Champions League Fantasy Football this season!

Stay tuned for more releases in the coming weeks. If you’re experiencing any issues with the app, or if you have any suggestions to improve it for the future, we’d love to hear from you at fantasy@support.uefa.com

The official fantasy football games for the UEFA Champions League are back.

What’s new:
+ BRAND-NEW LOOK AND DESIGN
+ NEW BOOSTERS IN FANTASY 5. Play Sharpshooters, Assist Kings or Defensive Rocks to score extra points.
+ LIVE MANAGER NOW AVAILABLE. Pick a team and make game-changing decisions as games are live.

Good luck to everyone playing on the UEFA Champions League Gaming Hub this season!

Stay tuned for more releases in the coming weeks. If you’re experiencing any issues with the app, or if you have any suggestions to improve it for the future, we’d love to hear from you at fantasy@support.uefa.com

Bring EURO 2020 to life with UEFA Games!

Fantasy Football
Spend €100m on 15 players and score points based on their real-life performances.

Tournament Predictor
Predict how EURO 2020 will unfold. For each round, guess which teams will progress.

Match Predictor
Put your prediction skills to the test. Guess every scoreline, first scorer and first team to score.

Update your app today to start preparing for this summer’s festival of football!

Predictor is back for a brand-new Champions League season!

From 27 August, you can start predicting the result of every Champions League group stage game.

Also in this version, we’ve fixed some crash issues on iOS.

Update your app today for the best possible app experience!

We’ve updated the UEFA Gaming app!

Clubs have now announced their final squads for the Champions League. You can now pick your Fantasy team from the updated squad lists.

On top of that, Predictor is now available for the Europa League and Europa Conference League – so you can start predicting every result across Europe’s top competitions!

Update your app today to take your gaming experience to the next level!
